answers.answer: I've heard you can stay at a 1 for weeks, and sometimes you'll go from a 1 to full 10 in hours. Depends on your body
Intresting, thats what my thought was, this is my 2nd bby, hopefully he can wait a wk longer. :)Thanks for the response.

I'm high risk so with my son was checked at 30 weeks I was a two, the Dr said "oh looks like he will come early".She induced me at 38 weeks because nothing had changed, and he was healthy enough to come.I was bummed because my husband was out of town working and I was told I couldn't fly to see him.
With my first i started dialating at 28weeks. By 32weeks i was 2.5cm and eventually had an emergency csection at 35weeks due to preeclampsia. So i stayed dialated for 7weeks.
I was 2-3cm dilated for over a week x
You.can stay dialated for weeks days or just hours. I staryed dialating with my first around 32 weeks and had him at 37 weeks. I dialated 1cm every week. Good luck with your delivery wont b long now!
I was at 4 cms from 37 weeks till when I went into labor at 40 weeks 5 days lol
If its not your first kid being one centimeter is pretty much a given in later pregnancy just because its been open before. It can stay that way for quite a long time.

question: How long can i stay 1cm open to actually go into labor. Im 36-6wks.Midwife said,atleast wait till Friday so ull b consider full term. Bt its nt up to me.im having a bit of crampin for a wk now.
title: 1cm opened
